name: Bright low
description:
Bright low its the greatest first-person shooter single player game ever when the robots revolution start there is no one can save is except you, if you cant take it so please don't play it



levels : you can play in 3 different levels quite and dark levels witch was a bright lights to see



game-play : you will fight the robots with your rifle to stand as long as you can, and the robots will try to attack you from nowhere

Featuring:
- High shooting skills
- single player
- too hard
- high Graphics
